skills.skill: APQP, PPAP, Control Plan, MEF, MSA, SPC
IATF 16949, VDA 6.3, GD&T ASME Y 14.5 M-1994

duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow up on department KPIs and set up action plans accordingly.
Ensure proper reporting on a monthly basis related to quality metrics and audits.
Design, develop, and implement proper quality control guidelines.
Actively participate in Product/Process audit on a weekly/monthly basis.
Actively lead problem resolution activities and apply customer requirements.
Train and mentor quality personnel when required.
Calibrate, validate, and maintain records of tools and checking fixtures.
Fulfill any new task or additional reasonable request deemed necessary by the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Quality Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
